module.name: Accounts/directory
module.description: Displays a listing of recently created HomePortals accounts with links to their public pages.

module.name: Accounts/login
module.description: Provides a login form to sign-in or register a HomePortals account.

module.name: Blog/blog
module.description: This module generates a basic blog where the author can post articles organized by dates. Visitors to a page with a blog module are free to leave comments for each article.

attribute.description: [Optional] Indicates the URL of a document where to store the blog contents. Leave empty to use default storage.
attribute.name: url

event.description: Raised whenever a post is updated or created
event.name: onPostSaved

event.description: Raised when a post is deleted
event.name: onPostDeleted

event.description: Raised when a comment is saved
event.name: onCommentSaved

event.description: Raised when blog information has been changed
event.name: onBlogInfoChanged

module.name: Bookmarks/Bookmarks
module.description: Displays a list of items and/or links. The url attribute of this module must point to a valid xml file in OPML format.

attribute.description: URL of the document containing the bookmarks in OPML format.
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Must be either Yes or No. Indicates whether to go to the URL address in the bookmark when clicking on it
attribute.name: followLink

event.description: This event is raised when someone clicks on a bookmark
event.name: onClick

module.name: Bookmarks2/bookmarks2
module.description: Displays an interactive list of items and/or links. You can add/edit/delete items. Whenever an option is selected the event bookmakrs.onClick is raised.

attribute.description: [Optional] Indicates the URL of a document where to store the bookmark entries. Leave empty to use default storage.
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Must be either Yes or No. Indicates whether to go to the URL address in the bookmark when clicking on it
attribute.name: followLink

event.description: This event is raised when someone clicks on a bookmark
event.name: onClick

event.description: This event is raised when a bookmark is saved
event.name: onSave

event.description: This event is raised when a bookmark is deleted
event.name: onDelete

event.description: This event is raised when someone clicks on a date. The argument passed is the selected date.
event.name: onSelectDate

module.name: FileBrowser/fileBrowser
module.description: Displays a list of files on the server

module.name: Google/google
module.description: Displays a form to search in Google.

module.name: RSSReader/RSSReader
module.description: Displays content from RSS and Atom feeds. You may select to display the feed contents in the same module or send them to another module such as a Panel module.

method.description: Retrieves and displays the given feed.
method.name: getFeed

module.name: RSSReader/RSSReaderFull
module.description: Displays content from RSS and Atom feeds. Similar to the regular RSS Reader, but instead of showing only the title, this displays the full content of the feed.

method.description: Retrieves and displays the given feed.
method.name: getFeed

module.name: editBox/editBox

attribute.description: [Optional] Indicates the URL of a document where to store editBox contents. Leave empty to use default storage.
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: The ID of the content entry to display by default. If empty, displays an index of all entries.
attribute.name: contentID

attribute.description: Indicates whether to load content before creating the page. Do not enable if content has any javascript statements to execute on loading.
attribute.name: staticContent

module.description: This module displays a box to display and edit html content. To add or edit content you must be signed-in as the owner of the current site.

event.description: This event is raised when a content entry is saved
event.name: onSave

event.description: This event is raised when a content entry is deleted
event.name: onDelete
